column5: As shoulder season stretches on I find myself anxiously awaiting Spring.  I try to keep busy hiking, snowshoeing and have even been dipping my toe into ice fishing but still summer calls Most years I use the time to get ready for upcoming trips    This year I have a busy slate, two canoe trips and a fly in plus whatever cottage fishing comes my way here’s a few of the things I do to ensure I am ready and kill some time https://www.northernjacks.com/post/prepping-for-your-big-trip Thanks Andrew
Hi Andrew I enjoy reading your blog as I, like you, do just about anything to kill time until Spring ice out and turkey season and then go steady right until late season bow.
